      • createFormatter

        IHadoopSequenceFileFormatter createFormatter(java.lang.String keyFieldName,
                                           java.lang.String valueFieldName,
                                           boolean overwrite,
                                           java.lang.String user,
                                           java.util.Properties hadoopProperties)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates IHadoopSequenceFileFormatter implementation, typically backed by Hadoop SequenceFile.Writer class. Each input record is written as key-value pair in the sequence file.
        Parameters:
        keyFieldName - field name of input record carrying the key of key-value pair
        valueFieldName - field name of input record carrying the value of key-value pair
        overwrite - whether to overwrite file or append to it
        user - user name - used for file system operations
        hadoopProperties - additional properties specified in a Hadoop connection
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createParser

        IHadoopSequenceFileParser createParser(java.lang.String keyFieldName,
                                     java.lang.String valueFieldName,
                                     DataRecordMetadata metadata,
                                     java.lang.String user,
                                     java.util.Properties hadoopProperties)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates IHadoopSequenceFileParser implementation, typically backed by Hadoop SequenceFile.Reader class. Each key-value pair in the sequence file is read into output records.
        Parameters:
        keyFieldName - field name of output record where in which to write the key of read key-value pair
        valueFieldName - field name of output record where in which to write the value of read key-value pair
        metadata - metadata of output edge
        user - user name - used for file system operations
        hadoopProperties - additional properties specified in a Hadoop connection
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
